YodasRedRocketBITCOIN BLOCK NUMBER: 763,201 - winner sunnybwoy Here are the blocks since the original selected block:763,196 - 00000000000000000000758c9dc8a0e18c260d25b75ecc93035afaafa6bfdbb1 = 61763,197 - 000000000000000000009bc854d34bff776dc53c0b587da5765ac49e69aab4eb = 94763,198 - 00000000000000000005207ce70062b25e4d654c22cf65a1b642dbc920e7a7f0 = 70763,199 - 000000000000000000064ebfc84a95e3fe2446e7abf6112cae5cf8ca95f53575 = 75763,200 - 000000000000000000078efb893c59c5a381ce7bbf65c01bedc6f9524e51855a = 55763,201 - 000000000000000000048232fcca7d559a194431c8bd8e2e3d79b73dca5dcdff = 35Some heroes are made, some heroes are born, and some heroes are chosen. But our hero emerged out of the cry for universal emancipation, in a world system shrouded with the darkness of injustice and oppression. At a very young age, full of determination like one with the spirit of Joan of Arc, she brought hope with the illumination of her sword leading many into a brighter future. And with her golden shield, she defends all who come under her protection to secure their destiny. As she travels all-round the continents of the universe to bring hope, joy, peace, and unity in the lives and hearts of all who come in contact with her. She was not born to die, but to cover the earth like the stars of the sky and to shine brighter and brighter into a glorious future.SIZE 21x27Inch (55,6x70,6cm)Wooden frameEach Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.Levins and includes certificate of authenticity timestamped on $BTC blockchain via Verisart.———————Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0———————or———————PRE-SALE Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5398270.msg60109088#msg60109088

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: Love the art and would like to see this run. It has been a while since I bought out a raffle, this one seems great!  I looked through the collectibles posts over the past few days and picked out 39 members in good standing who have been active (and who don't already have a spot, or have already purchased this art). Please give all of these members one spot, and the last 40th, to me.  I will cover shipping for the winner as well. If the winner wishes decline the art, then we can keep rolling blocks until a winner does want to participate. Payment = 0.00025BTC*40 = 0.01BTCPayment sent to 3LrcCugbhAG6wwUatf514HXwVECoffzBxztxID: aea5bea3a0c8a1d8fe4f4f4a0a20bf7ee210e67effc286d9cf9f1646911163abCode:2stoutAmax16AoluainArgawasbitbolobitcoiner24hBitcoinPennybullion-n-BTCChiBitCtyCoinHeatedcyganDirtyBirdEdoblezerodozerzEst2013Frank AlpenCoinhaloxonheistyHookzup1hotdog7HoxJanEmilKrogothmanhattanMarkzellersMbitrminerjonesMoparMiningLLCMortareOgNastyowlcatzPolymerbitPreciousMetapsICTQuakerBullraritycheckSteeleysunnybwoySweeteyeTweetiousYodasRedRocketand Geophphreigh ;)Enjoy, and let's roll this.
